subject: Players Championship (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: After being introduced as the 2004 Players Champion, Adam Scott, who won this year’s Masters, competed in the first round of the Players Championship in the same group as Rory McIlroy and Steve Stricker.
snippet: After being introduced as the 2004 Players Champion, Adam Scott, who won this year’s Masters, competed in the first round of the Players Championship in the same group as Rory McIlroy and Steve Stricker.
